articles.author: Paul Revoir
articles.title: We Need To Talk About Bill Cosby: Sex therapist calls for women to be drugged for money - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sonalee Rashatwar, a sex therapist from The US, was accused of 'rape apologism' after making the remarks on We Need to Talk About Bill Cosby, all episodes of which are on BBC iPlayer.
articles.content:
A BBC documentary has sparked outrage after a sex therapist suggested men who have a fetish about sex with unconscious partners should be able to pay women to be drugged.
The offensive remarks were … [+2572 chars]
